column1: #NOTE: This is a reference file including "source" as the prefix of the output files as unique label to the case study; "bam_root_fldr" is an existing output folder to write structured symbolic links to the input bam files for the samples of interest;

#            "BAM_src" if a specifically structured folder for each sample following a nesting from the original uncompressed sequence files. "smpls" is a list of samples of interest to build the loom output.
